TopicTitle: Parts failure mods compatible with RP-1?

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody, currently I'm playing with RP-1, it has a nice engine failure simulation implemented with Kerbalism and TestFlight, however parts other than engines don't fail at all. Default Kerbalism config for Realism Overhaul disables generic parts failure and limits it only to engines. 

Are there any mods or possible config  tweaks to enable malfunctions for all parts in RP-1/RO/RSS? Has anybody tried it with mods like BARIS or EVA Repairs or OhScrap?
